newsitem.title: USA: Carey Intl signs Virgin Atlantic contract.
newsitem.headline: Carey Intl signs Virgin Atlantic contract.

text.p: Carey International Inc said Tuesday its Manhattan Limousine unit signed a three-year contract worth $18 million with Virgin Atlantic Airways to provide limousine service for Virgin's upper class passengers.
Vincent Wolfington, Carey chairman and chief executive, said: "This contract will provide significant support to our internal growth prospects over the next few years."
Carey, a chauffeured vehicle service company, completed an initial public offering in June.
